articles.title: Total lockdown an option as Covid cases spike in Singapore this week; cases still high in South-East Asia - The Star Online
articles.description: South-East Asia reported 75,832 new Covid-19 cases on Friday, lower than Thursday’s 80,238. There were 1,390 fatalities, almost on par with the previous day’s 1,388.

articles.title: Taliban victory in Afghanistan may spur militants in S-E Asia - The Straits Times
articles.description: Analysts have warned that events in Afghanistan could encourage militant Muslims elsewhere to take up arms to topple their own governments.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: Shortly after the Taliban captured Kabul, an offshoot of South-east Asia's most notorious terror network Jemaah Islamiah (JI) congratulated the Afghan group for its "victory in freeing Afghan soil fr… [+10505 chars]
